article.headline: SE Louisiana 83, McNeese State 72
article.story: HAMMOND, La. (AP) -- Terry West scored 22 points to lead Southeastern Louisiana to an 83-72 Southland Conference victory over McNeese State Wednesday night. Amir Abdur-Rahim added 20 points, Michael Gardener had 19 and Nate Lofton had 10 for the Lions (13-4, 5-1 SLC). Lofton also grabbed 16 rebounds and dished out eight assists. Ryan Price led five players in double figures for McNeese (5-12, 1-5) with 16 points. Jerrick Oliver added 12, Eldridge Lewis had 11 and Ronald Dorsey and Monte Farmer had 10 each. Farmer also grabbed six rebounds and Lewis dished out five assists.
